Content: Several newspaper reports have stated that the United National Party is set to undergo several changes, with new appointments. Reports say the shake-up is based on the Party’s working committee decisions. * The number of assistant leaders of the UNP will be increased to three * Sarath Fonseka expected to take up one slot while another is expected to be awarded to a member representing a minority community. Reports also say that there will be a change in the party’s deputy leader position as well as general secretary and deputy general secretary. According to Minister Kabir Hashim, General Secretary – UNP, the party feel the importance to crate new positions to share the weight and responsibility. “.. As a party that spent 20 years in the opposition, we face many challenges when we come into power.”, he said. Please watch video for more.
